enhanced_description: Layam, established in Chennai in 2007, is a trusted and reliable management solutions partner, primarily catering to large corporates, educational institutions, and the automobile industry. With a mission to innovate service offerings based on client needs, market trends, and technological developments, Layam provides a comprehensive suite of services including staffing, job contracts, contract manufacturing, talent acquisition, learning and development programs (such as the NAPS program), and business consulting services. Layam focuses on delivering high-quality, efficient solutions to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, improve employee happiness and engagement, and reduce rework costs through an intelligent 'brain count strategy'.
